TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicRouteExpression extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpression

summary.span: 从路由信息获取主键以执行数据筛选。

span.span: Gets the primary key from the routing information in order to perform data filtering.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于页面标记中的控件。The class is used with the control in page markup. 类从 Web 请求中包含的路由信息获取主键。The class gets the primary key from the routing information that is contained in a Web request. 控件然后使用中的键`Where`子句。The control then uses the key in a `Where` clause. 这会修改数据源，然后返回由参数筛选表行的查询。This modifies the query for the data source, which then returns table rows filtered by the key. 此外可以通过使用指定的外键筛选数据属性。You can also filter data by using a foreign key that you specify using the property. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 具有源代码的 Visual Studio 项目是可随附于本主题：[基架动态数据](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=168914)。A Visual Studio project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Scaffolding Dynamic Data](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=168914). 下面的示例显示了产品表的自定义 List.aspx 页面模板。The following example shows a custom List.aspx page template for the Products table. 它使用属性来指定用于筛选产品行 ProductCategory 外的键。It uses the property to specify the ProductCategory foreign key for filtering the Products rows. 自定义 List.aspx 页将显示一列以包含所包含的 ProductCategory 外键列的类别的链接。The custom List.aspx page displays a column that contains links of the categories that are contained by the ProductCategory foreign-key column. 当用户单击其中一个链接时，List.aspx 页将显示包含所选的类别的行。When the user clicks one of these links, the List.aspx page displays only the rows that contain the selected category. 该示例需要以下项：The example requires the following: - 动态数据网站。A Dynamic Data Web site. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 创建一个新动态数据网站使用基架](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site Using Scaffolding](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a). - AdventureWorksLT 示例数据库。The AdventureWorksLT sample database. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 连接到 AdventureWorksLT 数据库使用。MDF 文件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d34ffbac-607d-40f1-b088-0a3304ea032b)。For more information, see [How to: Connect to the AdventureWorksLT Database using an .MDF File](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d34ffbac-607d-40f1-b088-0a3304ea032b). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicRouteExpression#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.dynamicdata.dynamicrouteexpression/cs/list.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicRouteExpression#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.dynamicdata.dynamicrouteexpression/vb/list.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicRouteExpression#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.dynamicdata.dynamicrouteexpression/cs/list.aspx.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicRouteExpression#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.dynamicdata.dynamicrouteexpression/vb/list.aspx.vb#3)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常不调用构造函数。You typically do not call the constructor. 相反，使用页面加载时初始化页面标记中的类和类。Instead, you use the class in page markup and the class is initialized when the page is loaded.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ColumnName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ColumnName : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置某个列的名称，该列包含用于查询数据源的外键。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a column that contains a foreign key that is used to query the data source.
The name of the foreign-key column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示外键。The property represents a foreign key. 此密钥用于修改数据源的查询。This key is used to modify the query for the data source. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定用于筛选要显示的产品 ProductCategory 外键列。The following example shows how to specify the ProductCategory foreign-key column for filtering the products to display. 此示例是为提供更大示例的一部分类。This example is part of the larger example that is provided for the class. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Linq.IQueryable GetQueryable(class System.Linq.IQueryable source) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetQueryable (source As IQueryable) As IQueryable

span.span: Gets the query from the data source..
An instance of the modified query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将查询从数据源，由表示`source`参数，修改通过应用是当前的路由信息的主键或外键。The query from the data source, represented by the `source` parameter, is modified by applying the primary or foreign key that is the current route information.
